resources.string:
- The goal of this game is to survive as long as possible without entering in collision with an obstacle.
 - You can destroy obstacles by shooting at them. To shoot an obstacle, touch the screen. The ammunition you have is limited. To retrieve new ammo, pass on a special ammo objects.
 - To move your spaceship laterally, tilt your phone on the sides.
 - You can pause the game by laying your phone horizontally (as you would putting it on a table).
